content_1: Hover on the image to see animation. Press next to turn the page
content_2: In the heart of an enchanted forest, a lonely princess awaits, surrounded by the whispering trees
content_3: Suddenly, a fierce dragon emerges, its scales reflecting the glint of danger as it blocks the princess's path
content_4: A valiant prince appears, sword drawn, determined to rescue the princess from the looming threat of the dragon
content_5: But as the prince approaches, the princess reveals a dark secret: she desires no rescue. In a shocking twist, she turns the tables, vanquishing the prince and choosing an new pathâ€”a union with the dragon.
